Download and view class notes of Engineering field.

Application Developer: Haider\nThis Application is for those who want to Beat Exams.
don

Thanks for installing Share Notes. As of now Share notes provide two services to the users.

1. Class Notes.
2. Discussion Platform.

You can view and download the class notes and ask any Technical, Non Technical or any real life life Questions in the Doubt Section. You can Contribute to our app by uploading your notes from the Contribute Section of Share Notes. The names of the contributers will be added in the Credits.
Open navigation drawer
Close navigation drawer
Share
Home
Settings
You\'ll recieve notification when someone post a question on doubt section.
You won\'t recieve notification when someone post a question on doubt section.
You\'ll recieve notification when someone comment on your post in doubt section.
You won\'t recieve notification when someone comment on your post in doubt section.
You\'ll recieve notification when we add new notes in our Notes Collection or for any other update.
You won\'t recieve notification when we add new notes in our Notes Collection or for any other update.
Turn on Notification in Xiaomi Mi and Huawei Smartphones.\n\n

1. Go to settings -> permissions -> autostart. From there, pick the Share Notes app, and toggle the switch to turn it on.

 2. Go to settings -> manage app's bettery usage -> choose apps, From there, pick the Share Notes app and select No restrictions.
You can select any of the following Department to view or download the contents of the particular section.
Go to the Settings to mute the Notifications.
You can set various features of the app from below.

You can contribute to our app by providing your notes and by purchasing the ad free version of our app. 
Procedure to upload notes.

1. Take pictures of your Notes.
2. Make the zip file of the taken pictures. 
4. Now browse this zip file and tap the Upload Button.

By Contributing in the Application your name will be added in the Credits.
Your feedback is very important for the Growth of Share Notes. Please help us by giving us the valuable suggestions.
This section contains information of our team members behind the Developement of this Application.
We provide free basic services for students to make their college life easier.
You can either search for a subject or can see the notes of your desired subject manually.
You can post your any question in the Doubt Section. Our Toppers will help you surely.
